website_summaries.verdict: Though other carts offer more features and space, this affordable model has a practical design that works for anyone who prefers one with a small footprint.
pros: Multi-tiered metal cart that's ideal for organizing basic kitchen items, from dishware to fruits and vegetables
cons: It's fairly small and the shelves have limited space with no work surface
The cart is also a bit wobbly

customer_reviews.title: Works well outside
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks in the pics. Probably my fault for not reading the specs. I keep it outside to hold plants, and it’s kept up well in the outdoor elements! Easy to remove one of the baskets, if necessary, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my "little" kitchen. Due to circumstances beyond my control, I am now handicapped, and unable to stand. We have taken tables, a 4 x 2, and 2, 4 x 18" tables. This stand holds my spices perfectly. It keeps them handy as I use my Instant Pot, Air Fryer, burner with a wok, and my microwave. Along with 2 plastic drawer sets that fit under the tables like my spice rack, I can cook again and feel useful.
customer_reviews.author: Melody LemaTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Solid little cart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart for my Laundry paraphernalia. It was perfect! I put my laundry detergent, liquid fabric softener, dryer sheets, lent rollers, iron cleaners, iron mat, all in neat organized boxes ( $ Tree ). It is very sturdy and not wobbly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great carts!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a rolling cart to take my needlework projects from room to room and keep yarns, threads and wool strips organized. I put two small trays in the top basket for threads, etc. Putting these together is so easy...they are well designed. I have used other rolling carts before but these are by far the best. After the first one, I ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.author: one silver bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love this 3-tier rolling storage space. I hardly have any storage space in my kitchen and this is perfect for my produce. It was very easy to put together and did not require any tools. I put it together in less than 15 minutes. I love that I can move it around to any location because it’s on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Kyara

customer_reviews.title: Wrong dimensions!
customer_reviews.text: The measurements photo has an error - - it looks like the middle and bottom shelves are 10.7" high (2.4" depth of the tray + 8.3" above that to the bottom of the shelf above = 10.7". But this is incorrect! It’s only 8" total. Maybe they meant the 8.3" to include the 2.4" shelf depth? I don’t know, but the 6" clearance really makes it hard for me to get my little bins in and out of the shelf/tray. That said... the cart is easy and quick to assemble, wheels are smooth, and it feels solid. I don’t know how much weight it might hold - it’s solid but its pieces are all thin.
customer_reviews.author: Oberon

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold extra bottled water and juices that we have on hand at a physician's office. It fits neatly under the desk, holds a lot and can handle the weight (as long as you don't want to roll it around a lot), and snaps together in just a few minutes without any tools at all. Brilliant design as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this item decent stars despite the fact that the wheels tend to get stuck, and the overall height is low. It functions for what I need and is attractive. The shelves are reasonably wide, and the price is pretty awesome. I plan on ordering another one for my office space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great little cart
customer_reviews.text: I like this little cart. Even though it's little it holds enough stuff. I use it for art supplies. It keeps them off my desk but right next to me. I love that it rolls and the shelves are contained so things don't fall off them. It was very simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Its Okay
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as storage for my son's baby station for his bottles and things of that sort. The reason I say its okay is because its so low to the ground I thought it would be a little higher. Maybe I should have got the 4 tier but even still the 4 tier would not have made a difference. It was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality & overall useless
customer_reviews.text: Cart is much smaller than the pictures indicate. It is difficult to assemble - no tools required, but it kept falling apart. I eventually had to secure all the baskets/shelves with duct tape. The wheels stick and occasionally pop out of the legs. The size makes it awkward to push. It's more appropriate for a child, except that it would fall apart quite quickly in the hands of most children.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Quick snap assembly
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is the perfect small cart to tuck underneath the kitchen counter. No more cluttered boxes. Everything is loaded on a nice little cart. It snapped together very well. I love this! No need of screws or tools. It took less than three minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t satisfied. Returning product
customer_reviews.text: I feel as if the description was not accurate. This rack is incredibly small and the trays/tiers are shallow. I wanted to use it to hold my produce but hardly anything would fit. Off to look for another one.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very sturdy once you start filling it up. Watch you don't accidentally turn on the brakes on the wheels. The tab is kind of hard to see and I accidentally bumped it on, so when I tried to roll it out it fell apart. (The shelves separate from the rack.) Totally my goof, so not taking a star away.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: very poor istructions for assemblying - was so much smaller than expected - wheels are fragile plastic - legs of cart are very fragile - would I order again???? never.....
customer_reviews.author: Tmoo

customer_reviews.title: good cart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my pantry to hold bottles of water to help organize it. The cart has rollers and is compact to allow room for my trash can to also fit in there. It does fine, but water is heavy (on me for my choice of use) so it is best for me not to roll it when full. It is working so far though.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio87

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cart
customer_reviews.text: I had a knee surgery and was confined to crutches; this worked perfectly to help carry things to various rooms. It is very light weight, super simple to put together, on the smaller side (which suited my needs) but rolls very easily over carpet and hardwood. Once I'm on my feet again, it will likely go into the pantry and used for added storage as it is a bit small for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Side Up

customer_reviews.title: Cart is so tiny!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work out for me...it was so tiny! I didn't read the size because it looked big in the photo. It would be fine in a pantry for a few small veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Venne

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together! Idk why that wanted me to pay to have it assembled claiming it needed expert assembly. You just snap the trays in. Simple. And very nice condition
customer_reviews.author: MamaPandaof1

customer_reviews.title: one was wonky, but would buy again
customer_reviews.text: we bought three of these and on one of them the shelves and the sides of the cart didn't exactly fit together right. We ended up not using the middle shelf for one of them and it turned out alright (we needed a space for bigger bottles anyway. These were a solid purchase and they are a great little under the kitchen island storage solution for us!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cart.
customer_reviews.text: This little cart is exactly what I needed. It fits perfectly in my tiny kitchen. I use it as a drying rack for dishes on the top (no room on my counter for a dish rack), and to store paper plates and recycles on the bottom two shelves. No tools required for assembly, just snap shelves into place.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Organizational Cart
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical but this thing is awesome! I took measurements to make sure this would fit under a certain table but it ended up fitting perfectly under this other little table and actually holds more than I thought it would! It even comes with a little thing of hooks that can hang over the side! Easy to set up and wheel around, I’m very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I use this for spices and store it under my island in the kitchen. It’s the perfect size for what I’m using it for. Super easy to put together. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sissa

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Was extremely easy to assemble and seems pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Was extremely easy to assemble and seems pretty sturdy so far. Pretty small but fits in the tight space I needed it for well. Very satisfied thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Small cart. Great product but beware of size
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great little addition. However note the size this is very small compared to how it looks in photos!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Luv it! It fits perfectly in my kitchen and rolls (the wheels have locks to stay in place too) easily when I need to mop under it. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: M.Rose

customer_reviews.title: second one
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for our bathroom closet and love it. So this was a second similar purchase to organize space on an RV. Great value and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nonfictionnut

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love it! I spend a lot of time in my recliner and this little rolling cart is handy to roll near and hold my cokes and coffees, my vitamins and rxes, my writing paper and magazines, my Bible and crossword books. It is so handy.
customer_reviews.author: AUNT BUNNY

customer_reviews.title: Great for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Great for what you pay, this drink cart was $60 cheaper than similar looking ones I found online. It’s not the nicest drink cart I’ve seen, but I’ve had no issue with sturdiness when it’s loaded up with several bottles
customer_reviews.author: Tim Drew

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good basic cart, quality is on the lower end of the scale. First order arrived with a broken shelf and some rust marks on others shelves. Amazon quickly replaced. Replacement was fine, but also small rust marks near weld points on shelf -- can see only upon close inspection, but still there.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Service was as we quick
customer_reviews.text: It did not give dimensions in the description, smaller than I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: nice cart but very small
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to sit beside my fridge to put things on while I opened the fridge door. It works for that. It was a little bit smaller than I was expecting but it works for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: lunchlady

customer_reviews.title: holding all my whatnots like hard drives and spare eyeglasses
customer_reviews.text: It's small and fits under the desk, holding all my whatnots like hard drives and spare eyeglasses. Great for home office. Easy enough to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bolchakova

customer_reviews.title: Glad I order
customer_reviews.text: I have some mobility problems and I needed something lightweight to move small things from one room to the next without carrying them. This work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and small
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than the pics represented. Not very sturdy. Unless you want something very small ok, but I thought it was a bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmBo68

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Like this little cart. The only thing I would change would for it to be a bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: daisy4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cart is the perfect size for what I needed. Easy to assemble and rolls nicely.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Tiny.Should have checked measurements before ordering
customer_reviews.text: While decent quality, this thing is so tiny, it might as well be a toy. I got this with the intentions of using it as a snack cart for after school snacks, but I'm thinking it would be a better functioning bathroom cart, next to the toilet with toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: small but very useful
customer_reviews.text: It's a little cart with a little job that works well for me. My nephew put it together for me. I'm not agile to handle that. But I like it and I'll keep on using it even after this immediate need is over
customer_reviews.author: Ole lady

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy enough for all these hair products so it gets the Job done
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love Hair Products! So thats what this was used for. It holds what I need it to hold. I'm pretty sure I'm going to need a 2nd one and I would Definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Frier

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, easy to put together but much smaller than what I thought but it will do. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: maxymax

customer_reviews.title: Check out the size
customer_reviews.text: Definitely smaller than pictured! My 6yr old granddad can use it for her dolls!
customer_reviews.author: Alice M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. Not helpful for us. I was highly disappointed that it cost me over $10 to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat mama

customer_reviews.title: The right size!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a rolling cart that fit into the space next to my sink and after much searching, this was exactly what I was looking for in a storage cart. It was easy to assemble, is nice looking, and is strong enough to hold all my extras. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Assembly is 1 2 3. Quality is very good.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.  😁

customer_reviews.title: A good option for a movable vegetable bin

customer_reviews.title: Works but too small

customer_reviews.title: Well packed. It went together fast but a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Well packed. It went together fast but a little tricky for first basket. Could have used a third hand. My only problem was it was smaller then i thought but thats my fault as i did not look at the measurements.

customer_reviews.title: Met expectation for purpose needed

product_meta.title: Homfa 3-Tier Mesh Wire Rolling Cart Multifunction Utility Cart Kitchen Storage Cart on Wheels, Steel Wire Basket Shelving Trolley,Easy Moving,Silver
product_meta.description:
Why Buy From Homfa

Superior Material
HOMFA Wire Rolling Cart is made of Durable steel with a space-age white/ Grey epoxy. This attractive Storage Shelves offers not only reliable strength and stability, but also a clean appearance with contemporary good looks that will nicely complement surrounding decor..

Multiple Purpose, More features are for you to find!

suitable figure to put in your cubby closet, wardrobe, cabinet, garage, entrance, foyer and other storage area
● Putting this wire rolling cart in kitchen to storage vegetables, sneaks,spice jars and other small kitchenware in place.
● Holds beauty supplies in your dressing room,made your make up in order and within reach
● Load detergent and clothespin in your laundry room 
● Use it as a folded clothes, towel or toiletries rack in the shower room
● Organize your plants in your balcony
● assemble to be a bookshelf in your study room, holding the books that you want to read everywhere

Durable, Locking Wheels for Mobility

Rolls with ease on four casters (two locking), It can be easily moved around from one place to another. Once it's in position, simply lock the wheels to keep the shoe rack securely in place.

Product Specification:

● Color: Grey
● Material: Steel
● Tiers:Three
● Weight capacity: 45lbs
● Product Dimension:17.7”L× 10.6”W× 24.8”H(45×27×63 cm)

Package Includes

1x Homfa 3-Tier Rolling Cart
1 x Instruction
1 x Tools
24-hour email customer support
Please contact us via FAQ & Buyer Message at the first time.

Purchase today and get free 2-day shipping for Amazon Prime customers by clicking Add to Cart.
feature_bullets: STURDY AND DURABLE - Made of Durable steel construction with a space-age white/Grey epoxy; finish on surface prevents corrosion in wet, humid environments,allow you to have this cart in your laundry room for years

OPEN DISPLAY AND THREE DEEP BASKET SHELVES DESIGN - HOMFA Rolling Cart comes with 3 Mesh Basket shaped shelves, Great for storing items in place, especially, SMALL items, allows air circulation and reduces dust build-up

IDEAL STORAGE SOLUTION FOR INDUSTRIAL AND COMMERCIAL USE - As the space saver, the 3 tier shelves can provide you more EXTRA storage space. Use it as your pantry, your junk drawer, your stationery supply holder, your craft storage, or any other multitude of possibilities., etc
EASY INSTALLATION - Product Size: 17.7”L× 10.6”W× 24.8”H(45×27×63 cm); The installation tool is included. Snap-together design assembles in minutes

4 OMNIDIRECTIONAL ROLLING CASTERS - Equipped with four smooth-rolling wheels, for easy movement and scratch-free floors. Once it's in position, simply lock the wheels to keep the shoe rack securely in place

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars410 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
